alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Kearney; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 7:30PM CDT until May 17 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Western Webster County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Adams County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 730 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Campbell to near Riverton to near Franklin, moving east at 30 mph. Another hail core was located near Hildreth. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Campbell around 735 PM CDT. Bladen around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Inavale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
